paper_title.ja: Effects of isoflavones and soybeans fermented with Bacillus subtilis on lipopolysaccharide-induced production of tumor necrosis factor-α and fibrinolysis in vivo.
paper_title.en: Effects of isoflavones and soybeans fermented with Bacillus subtilis on lipopolysaccharide-induced production of tumor necrosis factor-alpha and fibrinolysis in vivo

description.en: The effects of isoflavones and of a derivative of soybeans fermented with Bacillus subtilis, designated Nattoesse (TM), on the lipopolysaccharide ( LPS)-induced production of tumor necrosis factor-alpha (TNF-alpha) and fibrinolysis were investigated in vivo. The dietary supplement Nattoesse (TM) contains several isoflavones. Therefore, we examined the effects of individual isoflavones ( daidzein, daidzin, genistein, and genistin) on the LPS-induced production of TNF-alpha. Intraperitoneal injections of daidzein, daidzin, and genistin ( but not of genistein before a challenge with LPS) resulted in significant depression of serum levels of TNF-alpha in mice. Daidzein had the strongest activity in this assay. Oral administration of daidzein to mice also had a significant suppressive effect, as compared with that of the Citrus flavanone naringin. In galactosamine-sensitized mice, by contrast, the suppression of LPS-induced lethal shock by daidzein was very weak. Nattoesse (TM) did not inhibit the production of TNF-a nor did it prevent lethal shock. However, oral administration of Nattoesse (TM) to mice significantly suppressed LPS-induced increases in scores of the fibrin degradation product, and the effect was both dose-and time-dependent. Thus, it appears that Nattoesse (TM) has fibrinolytic activity during LPS-induced circulatory failure.

publication_name.ja: Immunopharmacol. Immunotoxicol.

paper_title.en: Effects of isoflavones and soybeans fermented with Bacillus subtilis on lipopolysaccharide-induced production of tumor necrosis factor-alpha and fibrinolysis in vivo

description.en: The effects of isoflavones and of a derivative of soybeans fermented with Bacillus subtilis, designated Nattoesse (TM), on the lipopolysaccharide ( LPS)-induced production of tumor necrosis factor-alpha (TNF-alpha) and fibrinolysis were investigated in vivo. The dietary supplement Nattoesse (TM) contains several isoflavones. Therefore, we examined the effects of individual isoflavones ( daidzein, daidzin, genistein, and genistin) on the LPS-induced production of TNF-alpha. Intraperitoneal injections of daidzein, daidzin, and genistin ( but not of genistein before a challenge with LPS) resulted in significant depression of serum levels of TNF-alpha in mice. Daidzein had the strongest activity in this assay. Oral administration of daidzein to mice also had a significant suppressive effect, as compared with that of the Citrus flavanone naringin. In galactosamine-sensitized mice, by contrast, the suppression of LPS-induced lethal shock by daidzein was very weak. Nattoesse (TM) did not inhibit the production of TNF-a nor did it prevent lethal shock. However, oral administration of Nattoesse (TM) to mice significantly suppressed LPS-induced increases in scores of the fibrin degradation product, and the effect was both dose-and time-dependent. Thus, it appears that Nattoesse (TM) has fibrinolytic activity during LPS-induced circulatory failure.

system_name.en: Scientific Technology Development Program for Small and Medium Enterprise

research_project_title.ja: 日本うるち米純麺の製造およびこしの強さの制御法に関する調理学的検討

description.ja: 日本米米粉100％の麺を製造し、麺のこしの強さを制御する方法の解明を目的とする。新製造法の確立は食産業の発展と日本産米の消費拡大に寄与すると考えられる。

research_project_title.ja: 中温乾燥法による果物のセミドライ食品開発

description.ja: 中温セミドライという新しい調理方式の目的は、余剰生産物の新しい利用法であり、食品廃棄物減量化への取り組みである。

research_project_title.ja: 大気汚染と野菜の栄養価に関する研究

description.ja: オゾンだけの障害と考えられた植物被害はオゾンと極微量過酸化物の複合影響であることがわかり、コマツナ葉も同様で被害により葉の栄養が優位に減少する。野菜の栄養分に変化を起こすオゾンと極微量過酸化物の解析を行っている。

research_project_title.ja: エゴマ鶏の開発と食品への利用についての研究

description.ja: エゴマ種子は多くのα-リノレン酸を含み、エゴマの絞り粕を鶏の餌の中に混ぜて与え、機能性のある鶏肉を生産する試みであり、循環型農業に寄与すると考えられる。

research_project_title.ja: 感染におけるHMGB-1のサイトカインとしての役割についての研究

research_project_title.en: Role of HMGB-1 as cytokine on infection

research_project_title.ja: エンドトキシンショックにおけるHMG-1タンパク質の作用メカニズム

research_project_title.en: Action mechanism of HMGB-1 on Endotoxin shock

research_project_title.ja: 日本の各地域におけるヒト尿中セレン濃度についての研究

research_project_title.en: Host Responses to Endotoxin and regulation
